src/index.ts.description: The formatResponse() function wraps ALL server results with MCP content format: { content: [{ type: 'text', text: JSON.stringify(result) }] }. This means servers should NOT return MCP format themselves - they should return simple objects.

src/models/interfaces.ts.description: ServerResponse<T> generic interface added at top of file. Shape: { data?: T, status: 'success' | 'failed', error?: string }. All servers should use this pattern for consistent response handling.
